definition: lit. looking for rain clouds in times of drought (idiom)/fig. desperate for an escape from a difficult situation
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
see 大旱望雲霓|大旱望云霓[da4 han4 wang4 yun2 ni2]
pinyin: da4 han4 zhi1 wang4 yun2 ni2

definition: drumming to make apricots flower, cf joke by Tang Emperor Xuanzhong 唐玄宗, playing the drum in apricot blossom
to stand on tiptoe and crane one's neck (idiom); fig. to yearn for sth
Lord of the East, the sun God of Chinese mythology
to look forward eagerly to sth/keenly desired
variant of 眷[juan4]/to care about/to look fondly on
name or river God associated with Yellow river
to stand on tiptoe looking forward to sb or sth
